title: Hyper Detailing Workflows in ZBrush - DigitalTutors 720p MP4
description:
Hyper Detailing Workflows in ZBrush
Software Used: ZBrush 4R6, KeyShot 4, Photoshop CS6
Runtime: 2h 1m

Explore finishing techniques for
HIGHLY DETAILED SCULPTS

About this course:
Throughout the duration of this tutorial we will explore finishing techniques for our sculptures, starting from the wrinkle stages all the way up to pores and skin bumps. 

After that stage has been completed we will transition into look development and start working with polypainting and rendering workflows within KeyShot.

By the end of this training you should have every tool you need to add massive amounts of detail to your sculpts in a realistic manner.
